title: Mamdani taunts Trump in election speech: 'Turn the volume up'
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani dared President Trump to keep up his attacks in a combative election night speech after being elected the next New York City mayor.

title: Trump's midterm worries grow as Democrats gain momentum and talk tough
shortDescription: Trump is charging into the midterms with an aggressive second term agenda. The off-year election indicates voters may be ready to pump the breaks.

title: 'We sent a message.' Dems sweep 2025 off-year elections: 5 takeaways.
shortDescription: Democrats won easily in Virginia, New Jersey New York City and California, setting up an optimistic entry into 2026 and beyond.

title: Mamdani addresses Trump with just four words
shortDescription: After winning the New York City mayoral race, Zohran Mamdani had just four words for President Donald Trump.

title: Mamdani's historic victory will have a big impact on Democrats
shortDescription: Whether you're from Texas, Ohio or Arizona, Zohran Mamdani's historic win will have an enormous impact on Democratic races in 2026.

title: For embattled Democrats, a 'proof of life' sweep in NYC, NJ, VA and CA
shortDescription: A good election night -at last -shows Democrats aren't entirely vanquished. Is it a warning flag for the post-Trump GOP?

title: Who won the Virginia governor race? See election results.
shortDescription: Here are the results of the Virginia governor's race between Democrat Abigail Spanberger and Republican Lt. Gov. Winsome Earle-Sears.

title: California OKs plan to redistrict in favor of Democrats
shortDescription: One of the most important Election Day battles essentially negates five new GOP-leaning congressional districts Texas created at Trump's urging.

title: Dems face runoff for Texas seat held by Jackson Lee, Turner
shortDescription: A congressional race in Houston heads to a runoff between two leading local Democrats. Two deaths left the seat vacant for much of the current term.

title: Election night analysis after wins for Democrats
shortDescription: With wins in New York City, New Jersey and Virginia, USA TODAY's Susan Page analyzes what this means for the Democrats moving forward.

title: These candidates made history in 2025 elections
shortDescription: From New York to Virginia to Detroit, several candidates made history on election night this year.

title: Michelle Wu, targeted by Trump crackdown, reelected as Boston mayor
shortDescription: Michelle Wu is headed for another four years as Boston mayor, gliding to an easy victory after running unopposed.

title: Chicago judge calls ICE facility 'disgusting' and 'unconstitutional'
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Robert W. Gettleman heard from witnesses staying at an ICE facility amid President Trumpâ€™s Operation Midway Blitz.

title: Abigail Spanberger defeats GOP opponent in Virginia governor's race
shortDescription: Democrat Abigail Spanberger beat Republican Winsome Earle-Sears in a race heralded as a bellwether for next year's midterm elections.

title: What's at stake in Supreme Court challenge to Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: In its biggest case of the term, the Supreme Court will decide whether Trump can impose sweeping tariffs on nearly every product imported into the U.S.

title: Who did Chuck Schumer vote for in the NYC election?
shortDescription: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer said he looks forward to working with the next mayor of New York City, but declined to say who he voted for.
